mapper.select:
SELECT ob.CBOB08 as goodsId, ob.CBOB14 as normalPrice, ob.CBOB12 as totalPrice, ob.CBOB10 as sendQty, ob.CBOB13 as remark, la.CALA08 as brand, pb.CBPB08 as description, pb.CBPB12 as model FROM CBOB ob INNER JOIN CBPB pb ON ob.CBOB08 = pb.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA la on la.CALA02 = pb.CBPB10 and la.CALA10='商品品牌' where ob.CBOB07=0 and ob.CBOA01 = #{orderId}
( or la.CALA08 like concat('%', #{goodsText}, '%') or pb.CBPB12 like concat('%', #{goodsText}, '%') or pb.CBPB08 like concat('%', #{goodsText}, '%') )

SELECT sa.CBSA08 AS supplier, pd.CBPD12 AS cost FROM CBSD sd LEFT JOIN CBDA da ON da.CBDA09 = sd.CBSD09 LEFT JOIN CBSA sa ON sa.CBSA01 = da.CBDA13 LEFT JOIN CBPE pe ON pe.CBPE09 = sd.CBSD09 LEFT JOIN CBPD pd ON pd.CBPC01 = pe.CBPC01 WHERE sd.CBSB01 = #{cbsb01}
